mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Estate of George W. Kitterman
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Estate of George W. Kitterman Elizabeth Kitterman, Widow, AKA Lizzie J.T. Jett, Administrator Alberta Kitterman, Daughter Nannie B. Kitterman, Daughter Dola T. Kitterman, Daughter Sallie A. Kitterman, Daughter Ada B. Kitterman, Daughter Peter D. Kitterman, Son Recorded in Ledger Book 5, Folio 44, in the Floyd County Courthouse. Date recorded as March, 1899 term
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
